values.text: Uncover Significant Savings
Are you leaving money on the table by overpaying for investment services? Let's take a closer look at the potential savings and how they could enhance your financial future.
Example #1

For a client with $2,000,000 in investments over 10 years, even a modest savings of 0.60% per year can accumulate to a substantial amount. With our expert analysis and optimized strategies, you could save a total of $499,809 over the next decade, ensuring your investments work harder for you.
Example #2

Even for individuals with $1,000,000 in investments, the impact of slight savings can be significant. With a 0.45% savings per year over 10 years, you could enjoy total savings of $185,620, providing you with additional financial security and peace of mind.
Your Specialists
Jamie Currie

Jamie graduated from the University of Prince Edward Island in 2012 and obtained his CFPÂ® designation in 2019. He is passionate about financial planning and bringing his team and clients from good to great to optimal.
Andrew Hughes

Andrew Hughes is a Registered Retirement Consultant. Andrew has over 7 years of experience in the financial services industry and comes from the field of education, having been a school administrator both in PEI and internationally. In addition to his RRC designation, Andrew holds a BA from UPEI, a B.ED from the University of Maine and a Master of Education from UPEI.
Patrick Steele

Patrick Steele holds aÂ CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNERÂ® (CFP) and Registered Retirement Consultant (RRC) designation, and has over three years of experience in the financial services industry. He is working towards obtaining theÂ Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) designation. Patrick has a passion for financial planning and enjoys taking the time in helping educate clients in further developing their financial literacy. Through planning and in-depth discussions, he aims to provide guidance for clients in achieving their financial goals.
Ron MacDougall

Ron MacDougall is an Associate Consultant. Upon retiring after a highly successful management career in the Telecommunications industry, he joined IG Wealth Management over 10 years ago. Ron realized that IG would be a very exciting new career path where he could utilize his skillset in conjunction with the powerful planning solutions within the company. Assisting clients in addressing their financial concerns with unique personal financial plans became his passion.
Our personalized advice goes beyond evaluating numbers..
Our approach begins with a deep understanding of what truly matters to you and how your needs might evolve â to ensure your plan today meets the needs of your tomorrow.
Our Solutions

With an enhanced team-based approach that provides both local and national industry expertise, Currie, Hughes, Mullins & Associates provides you with an elevated level of advice and resources. We provide comprehensive wealth management solutions and based on what is right for your unique needs, we will tailor an approach specific to managing your wealth and achieving your goals.
Tax Planning

Taxes are a critical consideration that impact every aspect of your financial life. As part of a holistic planning approach, weâll integrate sophisticated tax planning solutions to help manage the complexities of your wealth and ensure your overall plan is tax-efficient.
Investment Planning

We are guided by a disciplined investment approach that leverages the combined talents of IG Wealth Managementâs investments team and leading global investment partners. This helps unlock a world of opportunity
Estate Planning

Creating a legacy for the people, organizations and causes you care about requires proactive planning. We will help you create a carefully structured estate plan that reflects your unique wishes, protects your wealth and provides clarity to those you love.
Ready to uncover potential savings and optimize your investments? Schedule your free cost breakdown report today and take the first step towards financial empowerment.
Enter your email below to book your call today!
About Us
Welcome to Currie, Hughes, Mullins & Associates. We are a team of financial professionals who are committed to guiding affluent Canadians toward their financial goals.
Our Approach

We will build your plan always to reflect your changing needs and inspire confidence in your complete financial well-being. Our proactive and synchronized approach is based on experience and insights gained in serving a variety of clients over the years.
Community Involvement
We give back to the communities in which we live and work. Individually, and as a team, we support several causes and contribute to a variety of organizations.
